str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To be hungry, needy, desire earnestly. From the same as penes; to famish; figuratively, to crave.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Strengthened for a primary edo; used only in certain tenses, the rest being supplied by phago; to eat.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
A dwelling; by implication, a family.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From sun and erchomai; to convene, depart in company with, associate with, or, cohabit.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Singular
Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 1st Person Singular
str2: To give orders to, prescribe, arrange. From dia and tasso; to arrange thoroughly, i.e. institute, prescribe, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Left, left behind, the remainder, the rest, the others. Masculine plural of a derivative of leipo; remaining ones.
